MICHIGAN STATE UNIVERSITY
OF AGRICULTURE AND APPLIED SCIENCE • EAST LANSING
TELEVISION STATION • WKAR-TV
February 3, 1958
Mr. Sam Becker
State University of Iowa
Television Center
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
I am glad that you have accepted the chairmanship of the UA5B Research
Committee. It will be a pleasure to serve with you during what looks
like an important year for the Committee.
You will get a letter from Barsey telling about the radio inventory
project which will in all probability go to Harwood. I am sure we
members of the committee approve such a project. I am wondering if
Skornia checked with you about the Associations committment to this
research venture, and where this large amount of funds came from.
Sincerely,
Irving R. Merrill
Director of Television Research
IRM/cdm
